name: Edventures GBA Summit – Speaker: Future Proof Yourself
event_name: Edventures GBA Summit – Future Proof Yourself: A New World of Learning Powered by Technology
event_description:
This Summit gathers leaders, talent development experts, EdTech innovators and technology specialist to look into  
• talent development needs and trends in Hong Kong and the wider Asia region 
• applications of emerging technologies (AI, blockchain, data analytics and XR) to make adult learning more flexible, engaging, personalised and cost effective 
• roles of government, business and NGO in reskilling and upskilling the workforce 
  • EdTech investment market and business opportunities in Asia
address: Studio 303, Chong Yuet Ming Amenities Centre, HKU
